alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 3:54PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL ST. LOUIS COUNTY THROUGH 430 PM CDT... At 354 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brookston, or 12 miles north of Cloquet, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Saginaw around 405 PM CDT. Pike Lake Near Duluth around 420 PM CDT. Hermantown around 430 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Culver, Grand Lake, Burnett, Fish Lake and Twig. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
